title: Updated: UCI and Van Der Poel’s Team Pledge to Use ‘All the Legal Channels’ to Penalize Roubaix Spectator over Assault
content:
Governing body wants man who hit Mathieu van der Poel with water bottle during Paris-Roubaix to be severely punished.

Read the full article at Updated: UCI and Van Der Poel’s Team Pledge to Use ‘All the Legal Channels’ to Penalize Roubaix Spectator over Assault on Velo.
author: sstokes
